Text: Dr. Dre has issued a statement apologizing to "the women I've hurt," the New York Times reported Friday. The release of the N.W.A. biopic Straight Outta Compton has triggered significant coverage—including a harrowing Gawker first-person piece this week by music-industry figure Dee Barnes, who was attacked in a 1991 incident that led to Dre's conviction for assault and battery—of past incidents in which the rapper/producer assaulted or allegedly assaulted three women.
